titleStmt.title: Daphne Coronalis a pindarique ode, to the most august monarch James the II of England, Scotland, France, & Ireland, King, Defender of the faith : crown'd at Westminster, April the 23d, 1685 / humbly dedicated by a Loyal muse.
titleStmt.author: Loyal muse.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
